content.rendered:
Well hello everybody, it’s This Week in Genesis #10. This week I’m featuring exciting theme related news from Jesse Petersen and Carrie Dils, some showcase stunners; plus Brian Gardner and Lauren Mancke launch something new.

Themes

Jesse Petersen’s Genesis Theme project edges closer to launch:

Last chance to signup for pre-launch specials! Something's about to be offered that will never come again. http://t.co/rnMRI2tiCg #genesiswp

— GenesisThe.me (@_GenesisTheme) July 9, 2015

That awesome lady, Carrie Dils, is discounting her Utility Pro theme (and related setup services) by 20% until 17 July:

Lemme try this again: I don’t do sales around here…except right now! http://t.co/F8wBtXSxGp #genesiswp

— carrie dils (@cdils) July 3, 2015

Showcase

Susan Ramsey highlights a great looking customisation of Lindsey Riel’s Modern Blogger Pro theme for inspiremeasap.com.

Super cute customization of Modern Blogger Pro for a schoolteacher who moved from #blogger to #GenesisWP http://t.co/3x5qWgWeSJ @lindseyriel

— Susan Ramsey (@GraphDesigning) July 7, 2015

The super talented Shaan Nicol, launches a great new site for foxtelmovies.com.au

Foxtel Movies A brand new site for our good friends at Foxtel, this took me quite a while to get right, importing … http://t.co/MRy71zLmT3

— ChillyBin Web Design (@chillybindesign) July 8, 2015

Plus, a stunning new look for Jo Waltham’s calliaweb.co.uk.

New websites, new people and new office http://t.co/2Jyid2djbX

— Callia Web (@CalliaWeb) July 8, 2015

Podcasts

On OfficeHours.fm this week Carrie Dils chats to WordPress legend (yes, legend) Matt Medeiros.

I’m live with @mattmedeiros! Tag your questions with #officefm. http://t.co/XxppEVTKOV

— Office Hours Podcast (@officehoursfm) July 9, 2015

Meanwhile, the good guys and gals over at the UK Genesis Podcast are back again next week talking to Italian designer (but London based) Piccia Neri.

The guest on the next episode (15th July) will be @piccia. Read more about her: http://t.co/NbIsjtPkfL #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/5KvGfzBjUh

— UK Genesis (@UKGenesis) July 3, 2015

And finally…

If you didn’t catch it, Brian Gardner and Lauren Mancke launched a new royalty free photography site (with an excellent name), Minimography:

Here you go — FREE photos for you to use —> http://t.co/Q8IYM4XWxG

— Brian Gardner (@bgardner) July 9, 2015

That’s all for this week. However, if you’ll allow me to indulge myself for a moment, I have some news 🙂

ThemeValet

For those that missed it, I’m delighted to announce that this week I launched a new project, ThemeValet.com (‘WordPress website setup for busy people’).

If you think it looks interesting and you’re enjoying these Genesis updates (and I hope that you are!), I would love it if shared the site with anyone you thought might find it useful.

Or, if you’re a designer / developer, maybe it’d make a nice recommendation to those enquiries you get from people on a very limited budget (but don’t want to handle yourself).

Either way, thank you for  your continuing awesome support of GenesisWP.guide and I hope have an excellent weekend. I’ll be back next week with more of your Genesis goodness.

PS If you’re interested in the thinking (or lack of) behind ThemeValet, I’m posting regular updates about it, and, hopefully, it’s progress as a business on my blog, NickDavis.co

PPS Doing something awesome with Genesis or know someone else doing something cool? Get in touch and I will carefully consider its merits before next week’s edition.

excerpt.rendered: In this week’s action packed update, Jesse Petersen and Carrie Dils both share exciting theme news; a stunning showcase; plus a great new photography source
